scripts.build: cd vault-deposit && dfx build --check && candid-extractor target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/vault_deposit_backend.wasm > src/vault-deposit-backend/vault-deposit-backend.did && dfx generate && cd .. && cd vault-withdraw && dfx build --check && candid-extractor target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/vault_withdraw_backend.wasm > src/vault-withdraw-backend/vault-withdraw-backend.did && dfx generate && cd ..
scripts.test-deposit: npm run build && npx mocha tests/test-vault-deposit.ts --timeout 0
scripts.test-withdraw: npm run build && npx mocha tests/test-vault-withdraw.ts --timeout 0
